mapper.insert: insert into codetable ( section, name, code, description, code_notes ) values( #{section,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update codetable set section = #{section,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_notes = #{codeNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 and code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and section = #{section,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into codetable
section,
name,
code,
description,
code_notes,
